name: Vesting Wallet
description: Linear vesting contract with cliff period using stacks-block-time.
preview:
;; Vesting with cliff
(define-public (claim)
  (let ((elapsed (- stacks-block-time start-time)))
    (asserts! (>= elapsed cliff-duration) ERR_CLIFF)
    (ok vested-amount)))

name: Escrow Contract
description: Secure escrow with buyer/seller protection using restrict-assets?.
preview:
;; Escrow
(define-public (create-escrow (amount uint) (seller principal))
  (restrict-assets? tx-sender ((with-stx amount))
    (stx-transfer? amount tx-sender (as-contract tx-sender))))

name: Multi-Signature Wallet
description: M-of-N multisig wallet requiring multiple approvals.
preview:
;; Multi-sig (2-of-3)
(define-public (approve-transaction (tx-id uint))
  (map-set approvals tx-id (+ (get-approvals tx-id) u1)))

name: Token Swap (AMM)
description: Automated market maker with constant product formula.
preview:
;; AMM swap
(define-public (swap-x-for-y (dx uint))
  (let ((dy (/ (* dx reserve-y) (+ reserve-x dx))))
    (ok dy)))

name: NFT Marketplace
description: Decentralized marketplace for NFTs with royalties.
preview:
;; NFT marketplace
(define-public (buy-nft (nft-id uint))
  (restrict-assets? tx-sender ((with-stx price))
    (stx-transfer? price tx-sender seller)))

name: DAO Voting
description: On-chain governance with proposal and voting system.
preview:
;; DAO voting
(define-public (vote (proposal-id uint) (vote-for bool))
  (asserts! (<= stacks-block-time voting-deadline) ERR_EXPIRED)
  (ok true))

name: Staking Contract
description: Stake STX and earn rewards over time.
preview:
;; Staking
(define-public (stake (amount uint))
  (restrict-assets? tx-sender ((with-stx amount))
    (map-set stakes tx-sender amount)))

name: Timelock
preview:
;; Timelock
(define-public (withdraw)
  (asserts! (>= stacks-block-time unlock-time) ERR_LOCKED)
  (ok true))

name: Auction Contract
description: English auction for NFTs with automatic settlement.
preview:
;; Auction
(define-public (bid (amount uint))
  (asserts! (<= stacks-block-time end-time) ERR_ENDED)
  (ok true))

name: Lottery
description: Provably fair lottery using block hashes.
preview:
;; Lottery
(define-public (enter)
  (map-set entries tx-sender stacks-block-time)
  (ok true))

name: Token Faucet
preview:
;; Faucet
(define-public (claim)
  (let ((last-claim (get-last-claim tx-sender)))
    (asserts! (> (- stacks-block-time last-claim) cooldown) ERR_TOO_SOON)))

name: Subscription Service
preview:
;; Subscription
(define-public (renew)
  (restrict-assets? tx-sender ((with-stx monthly-fee))
    (var-set expiry (+ stacks-block-time u2592000))))

name: Crowdfunding
preview:
;; Crowdfund
(define-public (contribute (amount uint))
  (asserts! (<= stacks-block-time deadline) ERR_ENDED)
  (ok true))

name: NFT Collection
preview:
;; NFT mint
(define-public (mint)
  (restrict-assets? tx-sender ((with-stx mint-price))
    (nft-mint? my-nft next-id tx-sender)))

name: Token Vending Machine
preview:
;; Token sale
(define-public (buy-tokens (stx-amount uint))
  (restrict-assets? tx-sender ((with-stx stx-amount))
    (ok token-amount)))

name: Royalty Splitter
preview:
;; Royalty split
(define-public (distribute (amount uint))
  (restrict-assets? tx-sender ((with-stx amount))
    (distribute-to-recipients amount)))

name: Lending Pool
preview:
;; Lending
(define-public (borrow (amount uint))
  (let ((interest (calculate-interest amount)))
    (ok (+ amount interest))))

name: Insurance Pool
preview:
;; Insurance
(define-public (file-claim (amount uint))
  (asserts! (is-policy-active tx-sender) ERR_NO_POLICY)
  (ok true))

name: Prediction Market
preview:
;; Prediction
(define-public (bet (outcome bool) (amount uint))
  (asserts! (<= stacks-block-time betting-deadline) ERR_CLOSED)
  (ok true))

name: Token Bridge
preview:
;; Bridge
(define-public (lock-tokens (amount uint))
  (restrict-assets? tx-sender ((with-stx amount))
    (emit-bridge-event amount)))

name: Yield Farming
preview:
;; Yield farm
(define-public (harvest)
  (let ((rewards (calculate-rewards tx-sender)))
    (ok rewards)))

name: NFT Fractionalization
description: Split NFT ownership into fungible tokens.
preview:
;; Fractional NFT
(define-public (fractionalize (nft-id uint) (shares uint))
  (ft-mint? fraction-token shares tx-sender))

name: Decentralized Exchange
description: Order book DEX with limit orders.
preview:
;; DEX order
(define-public (place-order (amount uint) (price uint))
  (restrict-assets? tx-sender ((with-stx amount))
    (create-order amount price)))

name: Governance Token
description: Fungible governance token with voting power.
preview:
;; Governance token
(define-fungible-token gov-token)
(define-public (mint (amount uint))
  (ft-mint? gov-token amount tx-sender))

name: Airdrop Contract
preview:
;; Airdrop
(define-public (claim (proof (list 32 (buff 32))))
  (asserts! (verify-proof proof tx-sender) ERR_INVALID)
  (ok true))

name: NFT Rental
preview:
;; NFT rental
(define-public (rent (nft-id uint) (duration uint))
  (restrict-assets? tx-sender ((with-stx rental-fee))
    (set-rental nft-id duration)))

name: Bounty System
description: Post and claim bounties for tasks.
preview:
;; Bounty
(define-public (create-bounty (amount uint))
  (restrict-assets? tx-sender ((with-stx amount))
    (map-set bounties next-id amount)))

name: Reputation System
preview:
;; Reputation
(define-public (award-points (user principal) (points uint))
  (map-set reputation user (+ (get-rep user) points))
  (ok true))

name: Streaming Payments
preview:
;; Payment stream
(define-public (create-stream (recipient principal) (rate uint))
  (map-set streams next-id { recipient: recipient, rate: rate, start: stacks-block-time }))

name: Options Contract
description: Call and put options for tokens.
preview:
;; Options
(define-public (exercise-option (option-id uint))
  (asserts! (<= stacks-block-time expiry) ERR_EXPIRED)
  (ok true))

name: Flash Loan
preview:
;; Flash loan
(define-public (flash-loan (amount uint))
  (let ((initial-balance (stx-get-balance (as-contract tx-sender))))
    (asserts! (>= (stx-get-balance (as-contract tx-sender)) (+ initial-balance fee)) ERR_NOT_REPAID)))

name: Token Locker
preview:
;; Token lock
(define-public (lock-tokens (amount uint) (unlock-time uint))
  (map-set locks tx-sender { amount: amount, unlock: unlock-time }))

name: Whitelist Manager
preview:
;; Whitelist
(define-public (add-to-whitelist (user principal))
  (map-set whitelist user true)
  (ok true))

name: NFT Staking
preview:
;; NFT staking
(define-public (stake-nft (nft-id uint))
  (map-set staked-nfts nft-id { owner: tx-sender, staked-at: stacks-block-time }))

name: Referral System
preview:
;; Referral
(define-public (register-referral (referrer principal))
  (map-set referrals tx-sender referrer)
  (ok true))

name: Treasury Management
preview:
;; Treasury
(define-public (propose-spend (amount uint) (recipient principal))
  (map-set proposals next-id { amount: amount, recipient: recipient, votes: u0 }))

name: NFT Breeding
description: Combine NFTs to create new ones.
preview:
;; NFT breeding
(define-public (breed (parent1 uint) (parent2 uint))
  (nft-mint? offspring next-id tx-sender))

name: Decentralized Identity
preview:
;; DID
(define-public (register-identity (public-key (buff 33)))
  (map-set identities tx-sender public-key))

name: Token Burn Mechanism
preview:
;; Token burn
(define-public (burn (amount uint))
  (ft-burn? my-token amount tx-sender))

name: NFT Metadata Registry
preview:
;; Metadata
(define-public (set-metadata (nft-id uint) (uri (string-ascii 256)))
  (map-set metadata nft-id uri))

name: Quadratic Voting
preview:
;; Quadratic vote
(define-public (vote (proposal-id uint) (votes uint))
  (let ((cost (* votes votes)))
    (ok true)))

name: Perpetual Futures
preview:
;; Perp futures
(define-public (open-position (size uint) (leverage uint))
  (restrict-assets? tx-sender ((with-stx collateral))
    (create-position size leverage)))

name: Dynamic NFT
description: NFTs that change based on conditions.
preview:
;; Dynamic NFT
(define-read-only (get-nft-state (nft-id uint))
  (if (> stacks-block-time threshold)
    "evolved"
    "basic"))

name: Token Vesting Schedule
preview:
;; Multi-milestone vesting
(define-public (claim-milestone (milestone-id uint))
  (asserts! (>= stacks-block-time (get-milestone-time milestone-id)) ERR_TOO_EARLY))

name: Decentralized Lottery
preview:
;; VRF lottery
(define-public (draw-winner)
  (let ((random (mod (unwrap-panic (get-block-info? id-header-hash block-height)) total-tickets)))
    (ok random)))

name: Social Token
preview:
;; Bonding curve
(define-public (buy-tokens (stx-amount uint))
  (let ((tokens (calculate-tokens-from-curve stx-amount)))
    (ok tokens)))

name: NFT Bundling
preview:
;; NFT bundle
(define-public (create-bundle (nft-ids (list 10 uint)))
  (nft-mint? bundle-nft next-id tx-sender))

name: Decentralized Payroll
preview:
;; Payroll
(define-public (process-payroll)
  (asserts! (>= stacks-block-time next-payroll-date) ERR_TOO_EARLY)
  (distribute-salaries))

name: Token Swap Router
preview:
;; Swap router
(define-public (swap-via-route (path (list 5 principal)) (amount uint))
  (fold execute-swap path amount))

name: NFT Launchpad
description: Fair launch platform for NFT collections.
preview:
;; NFT launch
(define-public (participate-in-launch)
  (asserts! (and (>= stacks-block-time launch-start) (<= stacks-block-time launch-end)) ERR_NOT_ACTIVE)
  (ok true))
